sense.def:
A cloud
je velika količina vodne pare, ki jo vidimo kot belo ali sivo gmoto na nebu.

seg.quote: There were little white clouds high in the blue sky.
There will be heavy cloud over many areas.

sense.def:
A cloud of smoke or dust
je gmota dima ali prahu, ki plava po zraku.

Kadar nekaj
clouds
, postane manj prozorno.

seg.quote: He lit a cigar and soon clouded the room in smoke.

sense.def:
Če ena stvar
clouds another
, poskrbi, da je drugo stvar teže razumeti.

Če nekaj
clouds an event or situation
, poskrbi, da je tisti dogodek ali položaj bolj neprijeten.

seg.quote: Insanity clouded the last years of his life.

sense.def:
Če človekov obraz ali oči
cloud over
, je človek na lepem videti žalosten ali jezen.

seg.quote: His face clouded over with anguish.

sense.def:
Izraz
it clouds over
pomeni, da se nebo prekrije z oblaki.
